articles.title: WeWork says it is finalizing plans to divest its Russia operations - CNN
articles.description: WeWork said Monday that it is planning to divest its operations in Russia, one week after its CEO said the real estate company's "assets do incredibly well" there and he didn't think it would need to pull out of the country.
